mapper.select: SELECT id, productName, thumb, price, status, amount, content, summary, marketType, indate, ordernum FROM product
SELECT id, productName, thumb, price, status, amount, content, summary, marketType, indate, ordernum FROM product WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (productname, thumb, status, price, amount, summary, content, markettype, ordernum) VALUES (#{productname}, #{thumb}, #{status}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{markettype}, #{ordernum})
